attributes.action: Force David Cameron to disclose who attended the bilderberg meeting and the agenda
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron attended the Bilderberg conference on Friday 7th June 2013.
He refuses to say who attended or what was on the agenda.
As the conference is being policed by the taxpayer, David Cameron is a public servant accountable to his constituency and the country, we should be told what is in the agenda for the meeting and who is in attendance.
